pages.text: The Meka-Tool is a highly configurable late-game tool. It is very versatile in that it can act as a weapon, a pickaxe, an axe, etc. Using a $(l:machines/modification_station)Modification Station$(/l), modules/units can be installed onto Meka-Tool.

Press $(k:key.mekanism.module_tweaker) to access the Module Tweaker GUI. Here you can configurate the modules installed on each MekaSuit armor piece.$(p)Note: even though the Meka-Tool includes a $(l:items/tools/configurator)Configurator$(/l), it does not have a Configurator's capabilities.
